links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x (- 2 + 9 x - 6 x^2)/(1 - x)^4, {x, 0, 60}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 17 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n*(n^2+12*n-25)/6: n in [0..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 17 2013(PARI) a(n)=n*(n^2+12*n-25)/6 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 07 2015
